name: Razer Orochi Bluetooth Laser Mouse
Features: [Dual Mode Wired/Wireless Functionality, Tracking up to 100 inches per second, Ambidextrous design, Razer Synapse On-board Memory, On-The-Fly Sensitivity adjustment, Zero-acoustic Ultraslick mouse feet, Wireless Mode:, - Up to 2000DPI sensitivity, - 125Hz polling/ 8ms response, - High performance batteries are recommended for longer battery life, - To conserve power, switch off the Razer Orochi when not in use, Wired Mode:, - Detachable three foot, lightweight, braided micro-USB cord, - Up to 4000DPI sensitivity, - 1000Hz Ultrapolling/ 1ms response]
